specificTitle: The Lord Who Never Cast You Away
content: You also might be in the same situation of backsliding in your spiritual life,you might have gone far away from Jesus Christ because of your lust, you might have been put to shame by the people around you, you might have been discouraged and depressed by the guilty feelings of your heart, you might have thought that you can never get in line with God and moreover you might be in a situation where no one was there to give you a comforting word; Don’t be troubled, my dear Child. Jesus loves you.

specificTitle: The Lord Who Never Cast You Away - Tamil
content: You also might be in the same situation of backsliding in your spiritual life,you might have gone far away from Jesus Christ because of your lust, you might have been put to shame by the people around you, you might have been discouraged and depressed by the guilty feelings of your heart, you might have thought that you can never get in line with God and moreover you might be in a situation where no one was there to give you a comforting word; Don’t be troubled, my dear Child. Jesus loves you.
